metadata.Title: CVE-2022-44617 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in libXpm. When processing a file with width of 0 and a very large height, some parser functions will be called repeatedly and can lead to an infinite loop, resulting in a Denial of Service in the application linked to the library.

notes.Note: alexmurray> motif contains a vendored copy of libxpm under lib/Xm/ with files prefixed by Xpm eg. the file src/parse.c in libxpm is lib/Xm/Xpmparse.c

criterions.comment: libxpm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
motif: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
